extendedInfo.description: Our application is a great chance to learn the basis of the foreign language fast and effectively. Unique study method. No more grinding repetitive words translation that will slip your mind soon. You're supposed to figure out the meaning like children learn to speak. They link what they hear with what they see and learn the meaning of each word or phrase comparing the differences between actions or things. Nail down the knowledge that you grasp with the help of writing tasks. The full version offers:  - 30 lessons with increasing difficulty levels  - 1800 words and phrases voiced by male and female native narrators  - over 1500 colorful images There is a free version to try before you buy. It contains 3 lessons: from the beginning, middle and the end of the course. They are given to show the method and the course level that we offer About 5 million people all over the world have already chosen our application as a fair companion. Give it a try too! **Check out FAQ if you encounter any issues: http://learnlikekids.com/taxonomy/term/4 **

reviews.comment: Very effective.. Its true, when you figure it out this is one awesome app. I might add: an effective app. I would recommand this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: If u are going on hoilday to spain this will be great
reviews.comment: Excellent for anyone that is going on hoilday to Spain and wants to learn Spanish
reviews.author: Ellie-Mae Pettit

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Most useful
reviews.author: suraj subedi

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Pretty helpful!
reviews.author: Sergey Potapov

reviews.title: CONFUSING & SUCKY!
reviews.comment: I understand that using no English better helps you to associate the object to the Spanish word, BUT they show you 1 picture with a TON of stuff in it so you don\'t know what the word is referring to! There\'s a pic w/ a guy wearing sunglasses, leaning on a car in a field & 3 words underneath it. What the hell is that supposed to mean?! Theres a guy walking down a street in a suit holding a bookbag. Wtf??!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!
reviews.author: Justa G

reviews.title: Figure it out
reviews.comment: Ignore the complaints and try this if you really want to learn Spanish. The reason there aren\'t English translations is that the app is forcing you to THINK in Spanish. You\'re concepts in Spanish as you go. You might not know what a word means at first, but you begin to figure out it\'s meaning after seeing it used with different images. Associating Spanish words directly with images and concepts (instead of their English equivalents) is the only way to become fluent. Amazing app!
reviews.author: Veronica Vallone

reviews.title: Simply The Best Language App!! A++
reviews.comment: I didn\'t understand some pictures, so I installed the identical app in English. It was a little bit boring sitting through all of the English repetition, but well worth the patience. Now I do know what all of the pictures mean. I think it is worth buying full versions of both languages.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work...
reviews.comment: After its opening my screen gets locked. When I unlock it, the process is immediately repeated, which means that my phone is unusable unless I restart it and don\'t touch this app. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: most helpful for remembering
reviews.comment: this is great & like a game! please add more words & phrases, if i had a full language set like this i probably could end up being fluent. I love learning like a kid!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Backward sentences!!
reviews.comment: The plate is flying. Is the fish flying? There is meat in front of the boy. Potatoes with cucumber on a plate. Is the woman kissing a cat? No, she is kissing an apple. Nobody talks that!!  It\'s an insult to adult learners\' intelligence to present this as learning material.  Valuable space is taken up on the app where REAL LIFE HELPFUL SENTENCES could\'ve been used instead. I do wonder if stock photo was bought & then sentences just plucked from the air to fit in with the pictures rather than constructing out a course with proper sentences & then obtaining photos that fit in with them.  The writing exs don\'t work but the majority of the app is very good for supplementing your spanish learning so in spite of the flaws, i plan to buy the full version & i do recommend it to those with basic knowledge of spanish, otherwise you might be lost.  But if it were not for these ridiculous sentences, i\'d be rating this a 5.  These comments also apply to the rest of the apps in this series.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: got problems!
reviews.comment: idea is good but lacks stuff.. needs ordered alphabets: we need to learn the alphabet system of a language first.. navigation: can\'t straight away access the second lesson, need to finish the first one to reach it.. writing: quiz is k, writing sucks like hell, can\'t type.. translation: we get that kids don\'t learn with translation but only by observing, but the pics can mean anything, translation must be made available. But yeah, for translation, downloading \'English in a month\' kinda helps..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesnt work...
reviews.comment: Won\'t open after last update. Samsung galaxy S.
